page.title: 08Semi Detached House: Kirkby
page.content: My name is Jane. I live in a semi detached house with 3 bedrooms. Our house has 8 rooms altogether. We have a single garage. Since moving here we have had an extension built on to the kitchen. We have a back garden and a front garden. Inside the house we have a gas fire and gas central heating and we have an electric cooker. Our house is about 22 years old. Facing the house is a field and at the back are other semi detached houses. In our street there 29 trees and 4 shops: a hairdresser's, a newsagent's, a pet shop and a motor shop. There is also a telephone box which is not vandalised but only works for 999 calls. My parents chose to move here because they knew the area well and it was near relatives.
